      Constructors in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic with parameters of type TextTransformer 
      Constructor Description
      AcronymsToWords​(TextTransformer TT)
      class constructor setting text field to text taken from another TextTransformer class but with acronims changed into full words
      CaesarCipher​(TextTransformer TT)
      Divides input text into shift and plain text Ciphers the text using shifts in the alphabet
      CaesarDecipher​(TextTransformer TT)
      Divides input text into shift and plain text Deciphers the text using shifts in the alphabet
      Capitalized​(TextTransformer TT)
      Capitalizes each word in a text
      DuplicatesElimination​(TextTransformer TT)
      Eliminate repetitive words in the immediate vicinity
      Inverse​(TextTransformer TT)
      Reverse the sequence of characters, retaining the case of letters in specific positions
      Lower​(TextTransformer TT)
      Modify the case of letters to lower case
      NumbersToText​(TextTransformer TT)
      Class constructor, calls extractNumbers() function
      RomanToArabic​(TextTransformer TT)
      Convert string of Roman number into Arabic number as Integer and then change it to String
      SpecialSings​(TextTransformer TT)
      class constructor setting text field to text taken from another TextTransformer class but converted to be supported by Latex
      Upper​(TextTransformer TT)
      Modify the case of letters to upper case
      WordsToAcronyms​(TextTransformer TT)
      class constructor setting text field to text taken from another TextTransformer class but with some sets of words changed into acronims
